text:
Here you can chat with Cordula! And ask your desire functional or non-functional requirements.

e.g: You can name your service “My Service” and press Enter.

Now you need to write what do you need.

e.g: “I want to classify mountains and beaches on pictures. Performance is very important to me.”
We’re trying to offer you some provider, you should be able to see. If yes, It’s time to choose one of them by a smooth click. If no, please try again.
Choose the item that suits your problem.

Now you need to enter your timout number in milliseconds. The minimum number is 300 milliseconds.

e.g: “300”
Please upload your file by drag and drop or click on the box, files can be ZIP or ARFF files.
Now you have to wait for the final answer of Cordula!
